alert.note: Alert for North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:21PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL ITASCA COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 421 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Oslund, or 34 miles northwest of Grand Rapids, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marcell around 440 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Jessie Lake, Spring Lake, Whitefish Lake, North Star Lake, Bowstring Lake, Talmoon, Bowstring, Sand Lake, Spider Lake and Ball Club Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
